dataStructure.name: sid.org.tmforum.tip.cbe.party.dem.DemoCharacteristicValue
dataStructure.description:
A single value or range of values that can be used to define a DemographicCharacteristic.

This entity is optional
dataStructure.label: DemoCharacteristicValue

child.name: _valueType
child.description:
A kind of value that the characteristic can take on, such as numeric, text, and so forth.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: _valueType

child.name: _default
child.description:
Indicates if the value is the default value for a characteristic.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: _default

child.name: value
child.description:
A discrete value that the characteristic can take on.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: value

child.name: unitOfMeasure
child.description:
A length, surface, volume, dry measure, liquid measure, money, weight, time, and the like. Iin general, a determinate quantity or magnitude of the kind designated, taken as a standard of comparison for others of the same kind, in assigning to them numerical values, as 1 foot, 1 yard, 1 mile, 1 square foot.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: unitOfMeasure

child.name: fromValue
child.description:
The low range value that a characteristic can take on.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: fromValue

child.name: toValue
child.description:
The upper range value that a characteristic can take on.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: toValue

child.name: vaildFor
child.description:
The period of time for which a value is applicable.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: vaildFor

child.name: rangeInterval
child.description:
An indicator that specifies the inclusion or exclusion of the valueFrom and valueTo attributes. Possible values are "open", "closed", "closedBottom" and "closedTop".

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: rangeInterval

child.name: partyDemographicValue
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity *

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is an end of association DemoCharacteristicValueDefines

This association end is optional
child.label: partyDemographicValue

child.name: demographicCharacteristic
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity 0..1

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is an end of association DemographicCharacteristicEnumeratedBy

This association end is optional
child.label: demographicCharacteristic

child.name: partyProfileTypeCharacteristicValue
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity *

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is an end of association PartyProfileTypeCharactertisticDefinedBy

This association end is optional
child.label: partyProfileTypeCharacteristicValue

child.name: marketSegmentCharacteristicValue
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity *

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is an end of association MarketSegmentCharacteristicValueDefinedBy

This association end is optional
child.label: marketSegmentCharacteristicValue
